description: Main FastAPI application file for note management system. Defines API endpoints for CRUD operations on notes, sets up middleware, database connection, and startup events.

methods.name: startup()
methods.description: Creates database tables at startup if they do not exist.

methods.name: get_db()
methods.description: Provides a database session and ensures it is closed after use.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint to verify backend is operational.

methods.name: create_note(note: schemas.NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new note.

methods.name: read_notes(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to list all notes with pagination.

methods.name: read_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a specific note by ID.

methods.name: update_note(note_id: int, note_update: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to update a note by ID.

methods.name: delete_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a note by ID.

ctags.name: read_notes
ctags.pattern: /^def read_notes(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(note_id: int, note_update: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int, note_update: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
